Grouped_Utterances: I’ve been doing better! I started volunteering at a local community center.

It’s been really rewarding. I’m working with kids, and it feels great to give back. I’ve realized how much I enjoy being around kids. It makes me think more seriously about counseling. It excites me! I feel like I’m on the right track. I feel motivated. I want to make a positive impact on others, just like I’m doing now. I’m drawn to working with children and families, especially those facing challenges similar to mine. I think it will help me connect with clients on a deeper level. I want them to feel understood. It makes me feel connected to them, but it also worries me knowing they’re stressed.

They seem to enjoy my company. I think they appreciate having someone to talk to. They seem to be doing well. I think they appreciate seeing me more engaged and happy. Yes, I made it a point to ask them about their day more often, and they’ve opened up about their worries. I think it’ll help us unwind and create some happy memories together.
We talked about taking breaks and doing things we enjoy together.
I’m looking into programs for social work or counseling at local colleges. I’d love to take them to the beach for a day of fun. I want to finalize my college research and maybe apply to a program.
